answers.answer: It wont harm your baby but its not healthy with my first pregnancy I craved mc donalds alot too 2mc chickens and a large fry with a lrge dr pepper lol
Lol Thanks feel better am not sure why but all i can think about is bg mc thanks beautiful
Give in to your cravings sparingly. You don't want to end up with diabetes.

Eatting MacDonalds will be fine. Just try and eat healthier when you snack or have other meals. When I was pregnant with my first I craved pizza I ate it for breakfast lunch and dinner and my daughter came out just fine.

Exactly everything in moderation. In the beginning I craved Burger King so I would only eat it after a Dr. appt. Be careful fast food contains A LOT of salt which causes swelling you def don't want to bring on the Cankles or Carpal Tunnel

question: I have been craving for Mcdonalds almost everyday n i already had once, n normally i don't eat Mcdonalds but since I've been pregnant i stop thinking about big mcjust wondering if eating too much Mcdonalds will harm my babe
title: bad habit
